content: The documentary 'The Thinking Game' captures a team at DeepMind striving to unravel the mysteries of intelligence and life itself.
The documentary 'The Thinking Game' was filmed over five years by the award-winning team behind AlphaGo.
The documentary 'The Thinking Game' examines how Demis Hassabisâ€™s extraordinary beginnings shaped his lifelong pursuit of artificial general intelligence.

The documentary 'The Thinking Game' chronicles the rigorous process of scientific discovery, documenting how the DeepMind team moved from mastering complex strategy games to solving a 50-year-old 'protein folding problem' with AlphaFold.
